question: The preamble enshrines certain ideals that were first spelt out in
option1: the speech by Jawaharlal Nehru on the banks of Ravi when he called for Purana Swaraj
option3: a resolution adopted at the Karachi session of the Indian National Congress
option4: the Objectives Resolution adopted by the Constituent Assembly
answer: the Objectives Resolution adopted by the Constituent Assembly
